description:
This is where you describe your game. Pretend you are marketing the game and that people have no clue what it is.
Or make it silly. Whatever you wish I have no control over you.

v0.0.2.description:
### VRChat Archipelago v0.0.2
This update is compatible with worlds generated on version 0.0.1 and above!

For instructions on how to set up and play this, check the [Setup Guide](https://github.com/Nichologeam/VRChat-AP/blob/main/Setup%20Guide.md).

# Changes
- The APWorld now properly throws an OptionError if no Trap Item Weights are given (thanks to palex00 for reporting) [APWorld Change]
- Added version checking
- Included an info board in the VRChat World
- Included a status tracker for Udon-Midi-Web-Helper in the VRChat World

# Known Issues
Restarting the world instance after already sending some locations will cause those respective cubes to say `Awaiting Location Information...` infinitely

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nichologeam/VRChat-AP/compare/APv1...v0.0.2
